required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Retrospective Study to Evaluate the ConforMIS iTotal® Posterior Stabilized (PS) Knee Replacement System
clinical_study.official_title: A Retrospective Study to Evaluate the ConforMIS iTotal® Posterior Stabilized (PS) Knee Replacement System

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a retrospective, multi-center study, with one single remote follow up contact. This study will include a minimum of 80 patients and a maximum 100 patients who have been treated with the ConforMIS iTotal PS knee product.

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients will be contacted either by phone or email for a single remote follow-up. Retrospective data will be collected from medical records including pre-operative, operative and any follow up visits which have occurred since implantation as available. . All data will be collected from existing medical records and from single follow up call/email.
- Demographics and Medical History
- Pre & Post-Operative Data including Range of Motion
- Surgical Data
- Survivorship (phone/email or last known visit)
- Patient Reported Outcomes (phone/email single time point visit)
- Patient Satisfaction
- KOOS Jr.

primary_outcome.description: Demographics and medical history gathered from medical records

primary_outcome.measure: Pre and Post Operative Range of Motion
primary_outcome.description: Collected retrospectively through medical records, collecting range of motion from pre-operative visits and post-operative visits

arm_group.description: Patients who have undergone a total knee replacement with the ConforMIS iTotal PS Knee Replacement System

intervention.intervention_name: iTotal Posterior Stabilized (PS) Knee Replacement System
intervention.description: Patient-specific posterior stabilized total knee replacement and patient specific surgical jigs

study_pop.textblock: Individuals who are 18 years or older and have received a ConforMIS iTotal PS knee replacement to treat any condition indicated on the device's instructions for use.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Previously underwent surgical implantation of a ConforMIS iTotal PS knee replacement.
2. Over 18 Years of age
Exclusion Criteria:
1. BMI > 40
